body_html:
I'm happy to take a chance on merging this, since it builds for me locally!

But it'd be awesome to run Windows presubmits for every PR. Maybe an optional check at first though, in case it starts blocking people for no good reason?

I'm happy to take a chance on merging this, since it builds for me locally!

But it'd be awesome to run Windows presubmits for every PR. Maybe an optional check at first though, in case it starts blocking people for no good reason?
